Uses of Class
org.drip.function.rdtor1descent.LineEvolutionVerifierMetrics

Packages that use LineEvolutionVerifierMetrics
Package Description
org.drip.function.rdtor1descent
Rd To R1 Gradient Descent Techniques

  • Uses of LineEvolutionVerifierMetrics in org.drip.function.rdtor1descent

    Subclasses of LineEvolutionVerifierMetrics in org.drip.function.rdtor1descent
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ArmijoEvolutionVerifierMetrics
    ArmijoEvolutionVerifierMetrics implements the Armijo Criterion used for the Inexact Line Search Increment Generation to ascertain that the Function has reduced sufficiently.
    class  CurvatureEvolutionVerifierMetrics
    CurvatureEvolutionVerifierMetrics implements the Armijo Criterion used for the Inexact Line Search Increment Generation to ascertain that the Gradient of the Function has reduced sufficiently.
    class  WolfeEvolutionVerifierMetrics
    WolfeEvolutionVerifierMetrics implements the Wolfe Criterion used for the Inexact Line Search Increment Generation.
    Methods in org.drip.function.rdtor1descent that return LineEvolutionVerifierMetrics

    LineEvolutionVerifierMetrics ArmijoEvolutionVerifier.metrics​(UnitVector targetDirectionUnitVector, double[] currentVariateArray, RdToR1 multivariateFunction, double stepLength)  
    LineEvolutionVerifierMetrics CurvatureEvolutionVerifier.metrics​(UnitVector targetDirectionUnitVector, double[] currentVariateArray, RdToR1 multivariateFunction, double stepLength)  
    abstract LineEvolutionVerifierMetrics LineEvolutionVerifier.metrics​(UnitVector targetDirectionUnitVector, double[] currentVariateArray, RdToR1 multivariateFunction, double stepLength)
    Generate the Verifier Metrics for the Specified Inputs
    LineEvolutionVerifierMetrics WolfeEvolutionVerifier.metrics​(UnitVector targetDirectionUnitVector, double[] currentVariateArray, RdToR1 multivariateFunction, double stepLength)
